projectNameURL.description: URL for the user's project name

region.description: Region or state of the user

stripeAccountId.description: Stripe account ID of the user

stripeOnboardingDone.description: Indicates if Stripe onboarding is complete

stripeDetailsSubmitted.description: Indicates if Stripe details have been submitted

experimentalFeatures.description: Indicates if experimental features are enabled

resetToken.description: Token for resetting the user's password

stripeCustomer.description: Stripe customer information for the user

appliedTrial.description: Indicates if the user has applied a trial

projects.description: List of projects associated with the user

groups.description: List of groups associated with the user

administrators.description: List of administrators associated with the user

editors.description: List of editors associated with the user

invites.description: List of invites associated with the user

hideBrandingIcon.description: Indicates if the branding icon is hidden in the viewer

hideLoadingLogo.description: Indicates if the loading logo is hidden in the viewer

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use an object to search for groups with specific values

skip.description: Skip over the specified number of documents

limit.description: Specify the maximum number of documents that should be returned

_id.description: The unique identifier for the group.

user.description: Reference to the user who owns the group.

showAvailableFirst.description: Whether to prioritize showing available items first.

accentColor.description: Accent color of the group.

svgGroupId.description: SVG group identifier.

initialView.description: Initial view of the group.

unitImageOnGrid.description: Image type shown on the grid.

pricesStartingAt.description: Whether to show prices starting at a certain value.

priceBeforeTax.description: Whether the price is shown before tax.

alternativeCovers.description: List of alternative cover images.

hideArea.description: Whether to hide the area field.

showBranding.description: Whether to show branding.

showPriceFilter.description: Whether to show the price filter.

showAreaFilter.description: Whether to show the area filter.

showFloorOverview.description: Whether to show the floor overview.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use an object to search for projects with specific values

skip.description: Skip over the specified number of documents

limit.description: Specify the maximum number of documents that should be returned

user.description: Reference to the User associated with the project.

floors.description: List of references to Floor documents.

commercialSpaces.description: List of references to CommercialSpace documents.

accentColor.description: Accent color for the project branding.

showInclusions.description: Whether inclusions are displayed in the project.

showBathrooms.description: Whether bathrooms are displayed in the project.

showAdditionalInfo.description: Whether additional information is displayed in the project.

brochureButtonEnabled.description: Whether the brochure button is enabled.

customButtonEnabled.description: Whether a custom button is enabled.

customButtonOpensAt.description: Specifies where the custom button opens.

initialView.description: Initial view mode of the project.

gtmEnabled.description: Whether Google Tag Manager is enabled.

showAvailableFirst.description: Whether available units are shown first.

unitImageOnGrid.description: Type of unit image displayed on the grid.

skipFloorStep.description: Whether the floor step is skipped in navigation.

showUnitCustomFinishes.description: Whether custom finishes for units are shown.

showFloorOverview.description: Whether the floor overview is displayed.

pricesStartingAt.description: Whether prices display as 'starting at'.

showPriceFilter.description: Whether the price filter is displayed.

showAreaFilter.description: Whether the area filter is displayed.

sharePageEnabled.description: Whether the share page feature is enabled.

priceBeforeTax.description: Whether prices are shown before tax.

enableForms.description: Whether forms are enabled for the project.

rentalObject.description: Whether the project is a rental property.

hideArea.description: Whether the area information is hidden.

showBranding.description: Whether branding is shown on the project page.

projectImageUrl.description: URL of the project's main image.

alternativeCovers.description: List of alternative cover images for the project.

customButtonActionType.description: Action type for the custom button.

svgGroupId.description: Group ID in the project's SVG.

layoutImageUrl.description: URL for the project's layout image.

formsSendTo.description: Email address to send forms to.

formsRedirectURL.description: URL to redirect after forms submission.

lotsLayout.description: Layout for lots in the project.

similarSortingBy.description: Method of sorting for similar items.

onHoldExperienceEnabled.description: Whether the on-hold experience is enabled.

landOnly.description: Whether the project is for land only.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Use a project ID to search for units

parameters.name: fid
parameters.description: Use a floor ID to search for units

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Use an object to search for units with specific values

skip.description: Skip over the specified number of documents

limit.description: Specify the maximum number of documents that should be returned

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position or order of the unit

bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the unit

isFeatured.description: Indicates if the unit is featured

unitPriceTBD.description: Indicates if the unit price is to be determined

specificType.description: Specific type, e.g., 'Amenities', 'Parkings'. Defaults to 'unit' if not specified

lotPath.description: Path for the lot associated with the unit

onHoldExpiresAt.description: Expiration date for the unit's hold status

brochurePDF.description: URL of the brochure in PDF format

customButtonUrl.description: Custom URL for the unit's button

customButtonSnippet.description: Custom snippet for the unit's button

get.summary: Search for leads in a project

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: Use a project ID to search for leads

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the lead was created

questions.description: List of questions and their corresponding answers

customFields.description: List of custom fields and their values

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the lead was created

questions.description: List of questions and their corresponding answers

customFields.description: List of custom fields and their values

projectNameURL.description: URL for the user's project name

region.description: Region or state of the user

stripeAccountId.description: Stripe account ID of the user

stripeOnboardingDone.description: Indicates if Stripe onboarding is complete

stripeDetailsSubmitted.description: Indicates if Stripe details have been submitted

experimentalFeatures.description: Indicates if experimental features are enabled

resetToken.description: Token for resetting the user's password

stripeCustomer.description: Stripe customer information for the user

appliedTrial.description: Indicates if the user has applied a trial

projects.description: List of projects associated with the user

groups.description: List of groups associated with the user

administrators.description: List of administrators associated with the user

editors.description: List of editors associated with the user

invites.description: List of invites associated with the user

hideBrandingIcon.description: Indicates if the branding icon is hidden in the viewer

hideLoadingLogo.description: Indicates if the loading logo is hidden in the viewer

_id.description: The unique identifier for the group.

user.description: Reference to the user who owns the group.

showAvailableFirst.description: Whether to prioritize showing available items first.

accentColor.description: Accent color of the group.

svgGroupId.description: SVG group identifier.

initialView.description: Initial view of the group.

unitImageOnGrid.description: Image type shown on the grid.

pricesStartingAt.description: Whether to show prices starting at a certain value.

priceBeforeTax.description: Whether the price is shown before tax.

alternativeCovers.description: List of alternative cover images.

hideArea.description: Whether to hide the area field.

showBranding.description: Whether to show branding.

showPriceFilter.description: Whether to show the price filter.

showAreaFilter.description: Whether to show the area filter.

showFloorOverview.description: Whether to show the floor overview.

user.description: Reference to the User associated with the project.

floors.description: List of references to Floor documents.

commercialSpaces.description: List of references to CommercialSpace documents.

accentColor.description: Accent color for the project branding.

showInclusions.description: Whether inclusions are displayed in the project.

showBathrooms.description: Whether bathrooms are displayed in the project.

showAdditionalInfo.description: Whether additional information is displayed in the project.

brochureButtonEnabled.description: Whether the brochure button is enabled.

customButtonEnabled.description: Whether a custom button is enabled.

customButtonOpensAt.description: Specifies where the custom button opens.

initialView.description: Initial view mode of the project.

gtmEnabled.description: Whether Google Tag Manager is enabled.

showAvailableFirst.description: Whether available units are shown first.

unitImageOnGrid.description: Type of unit image displayed on the grid.

skipFloorStep.description: Whether the floor step is skipped in navigation.

showUnitCustomFinishes.description: Whether custom finishes for units are shown.

showFloorOverview.description: Whether the floor overview is displayed.

pricesStartingAt.description: Whether prices display as 'starting at'.

showPriceFilter.description: Whether the price filter is displayed.

showAreaFilter.description: Whether the area filter is displayed.

sharePageEnabled.description: Whether the share page feature is enabled.

priceBeforeTax.description: Whether prices are shown before tax.

enableForms.description: Whether forms are enabled for the project.

rentalObject.description: Whether the project is a rental property.

hideArea.description: Whether the area information is hidden.

showBranding.description: Whether branding is shown on the project page.

projectImageUrl.description: URL of the project's main image.

alternativeCovers.description: List of alternative cover images for the project.

customButtonActionType.description: Action type for the custom button.

svgGroupId.description: Group ID in the project's SVG.

layoutImageUrl.description: URL for the project's layout image.

formsSendTo.description: Email address to send forms to.

formsRedirectURL.description: URL to redirect after forms submission.

lotsLayout.description: Layout for lots in the project.

similarSortingBy.description: Method of sorting for similar items.

onHoldExperienceEnabled.description: Whether the on-hold experience is enabled.

landOnly.description: Whether the project is for land only.

position.description: Position or order of the floor

bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the unit

isFeatured.description: Indicates if the unit is featured

unitPriceTBD.description: Indicates if the unit price is to be determined

specificType.description: Specific type, e.g., 'Amenities', 'Parkings'. Defaults to 'unit' if not specified

lotPath.description: Path for the lot associated with the unit

onHoldExpiresAt.description: Expiration date for the unit's hold status

brochurePDF.description: URL of the brochure in PDF format

customButtonUrl.description: Custom URL for the unit's button

customButtonSnippet.description: Custom snippet for the unit's button

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the lead was created

questions.description: List of questions and their corresponding answers

customFields.description: List of custom fields and their values
